title: How To Begcame A Hacker Complete Guide
snippet: What is linux?Linux ဆိုတာ ဘာလဲ လို့ မေးလာရင် Linux ဆိုတာ တစ်ကမ္ဘာလုံးကို အခမဲ့ပေးသုံးတဲ Open Source OS တစ်ခုလို့ပဲ ဖြေဖြစ်ပါလိမ့်မယ်ဒါဆို ထပ်မေးစရာရှိလာလိမ့်မယ်ဗျ Open Source ဆိုတာ ဘာလဲလို့ပေါ Open Source ဆိုတာ လွတ်လပ်စွာ ပြင်ဆင်/ပြောင်းလဲခွင့် Develop လုပ်ခွင့် Customize လုပ်ခွင့် ပေးထားခြင်းကို...

title: Introduce to Linux And Termux (shell cmd)

title: Customize the Favicon
snippet: In Chirpy, the image files of Favicons are placed in assets/img/favicons/. You may need to replace them with your own. So let’s see how to customize these Favicons.With a square image (PNG, JPG or GIF) in hand, open the site Favicon &amp; App Icon Generator and upload your original image.Clic...

title: Getting Started
snippet: InstallationFork Chirpy on GitHub, rename the repository to USERNAME.github.io (where USERNAME is your GitHub username), and then open terminal and clone the fork to local by:$ git clone https://github.com/USERNAME/USERNAME.github.io.git -b master --single-branchSetting up the local envrionmentIf...

title: Writing a New Post
snippet: Naming and PathCreate a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _post/ of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown.Front MatterBasically, you need to fill the Front Matter as below at the top of the post:---title: TITLEdate: YYYY-MM-DD ...
